name: DOWNBEAT (Vykri, Audio Withdrawal)
description:
This game was created in 10 days for Juice Jam 2. In this game, you play as a live streaming DJ who needs to manage his stream while also mixing his beats.

Controls

Mouse - Navigate menus

ASDF - Hit notes while focused on the DJ app phone

Keyboard - Type "thanks" or "/ban" to react to people in chat while focused on the chat phone

1, 2, 3 - Respond to a message from a loved one while focused on the live stream phone

Tab / Left shift - Rotate phones to the left

Enter / Right shift - Rotate phones to the right

Esc / Backspace - Open pause menu

Credits

Programming - Vykri

Sound / Music - Audio Withdrawal

Dulcemente (song) - Audio Withdrawal and Jela Music

Art - Kitsune

Consultation - Abisko

Many art assets were generated by Stable Diffusion AI. To make a cohesive art style, we used Envvi's Inkpunk model.
